column5: Hey all, long time lurker small time poster. I've been looking to get into learning the rivers in my area for a long time and finally have the drive to do it. I live in the North waterloo area, work out of elmira and look at fishing after work or some weekend mornings on the conestogo or grand or nith.  Whether your new like me or a regular on the rivers, toss me a pm and we'll go find some fish  Tyler

I'm from the area (live in Elmira) and I fish the local area 4-5 times per week.  If you're willing to fish barbless, don't litter, and catch and release (on our rivers anyways) we can fish sometime . . . send me a pm.
Ryan is a good guy. I have had the pleasure of fishing with him and he'll have you learning the ropes pretty quick.
I Think thats Racist To The Rivers  Whats make your river better than any other river?
63 Posts 60 Attempts to start an internet fight.  Racist to rivers because I like to keep them clean and have fish in them?
